UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Role of amino acid residues within the disulfide loop of thanatin, a potent antibiotic peptide.
Literature.Author: Lee MK, Cha L, Lee SH, Hahm KS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli HB101(MIC=2.6µM),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=1.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=5.2µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=5.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=20.8µM)
